title: Multi-chain bridge
body:
As discussed in the community, some suggested using the same token across multiple chains, using a bridge and wrapping our token. 
Please take a look at the entire discussion before voting - the main difference is the direct "effect" some are looking for between token variants vs flexibility for game providers ( having the option to decide on the right GMF token for their use )

Note that creating the bridge and changing the token contracts will cause delays ( and will require airdrops )
author: 0x30f5EBB6357521A67c1227826c04CA8Adb1f5c88
